name: Certificate of Undergraduate Study in Environmental Humanities

Certificate of Undergraduate Study in En: Certificate of Undergraduate Study in Environmental Humanities This CUGS in Environmental Humanities introduces students to the methods of the Humanities to interrogate the human contexts of environmental issues, which are crucial for effectively applying STEM findings and developments in complex cultural worlds. At the same time, this program offers students in the Humanities opportunities to explore how the critical thinking and communication skills they have developed might be applied to other fields and career paths.
